6107.quoteText:
We also do not collect your IP address if you visit our website or if you use our contact form or webmailer.
We also do not collect or save your IP address if you use an external client to retrieve your emails via IMAP or POP3 or to transmit messages via SMTP to be delivered by us.
6107.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

tosdr.case: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

6112.quoteText: You can export and save all of your data stored at Posteo (emails, contacts, calendars, notes) locally at any time with the help of open standards and freely available programs.
